About.title: About Me
About.short: I'm shuntia. A high schooler from the US. I build high-performance systems in Rust and creative tools for audio/video. I value correctness, minimalism, and zero global state.
About.extended: I specialize in systems programming (Rust, Tokio), ECS architectures, and performant UI. I build things like Lunaris (a modular video editor) and qdp (a resilience protocol). I run Arch (Hyprland), produce UTAU music, and draw. I have a strict engineering philosophy: strong types, no magic, and absolute reliability.
